title: Teaching Methodology Practical Skills Enhancement: Customized MOOC-Based Program for Ecuadorian Water Utility Operators

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Perform five core skills for water supply system maintenance (annual planning, water quality testing, leak detection, etc.) with 80% accuracy
Complete problem-solving projects at least twice monthly using simulation tools provided on the MOOC platform
Conduct peer assessments and feedback exchanges at least once weekly through learning community activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
